text: Stadio Giovanni Chiggiato is a multi-purpose stadium in Caorle, Italy. It is mainly used for football matches and athletics meetings. In September 2014 the Italy national under-18 football team beat the England national under-18 football team 2–0 at the stadium. ==References== ==External links== * Profile at Città di Caorle Category:Football venues in Italy Category:Multi-purpose stadiums in Italy
title: Stadio Giovanni Chiggiato
